revision.text:
[[Category:Router]]
'''Cisco 12000 Series Gigabit Switch Router (GSR)'''
== History ==
Internal code name: BFR [Big 'Fast' Router - an homage to Doom's BFG 9000] (The references to this code name can be seen in various bootstrap messages and on some hardware)
The Cisco GSR is a router developed in the mid 1990s to provide network service providers with the next generation of routing technologies. Previously, [[Cisco 7500]]s were used as the backbone of many networks.
== Models ==
There are several GSR variants today:
* 12006 - Code Name: Sushi * 12008 * 12010 - Code Name: Sushi * 12012 * 12016 * 12404 - Code Name: Toddler * 12406 - Code Name: Quarter Dome * 12410 - Code Name: Half Dome * 12416 - Code Name: Magma * 12810 - Code Name: Silver Bullet-10 * 12816 - Code Name: Silver Bullet-16
[[GSR-Info]] quick reference guide
== Anatomy ==
* [[Fabric]] * [[MBUS]] * [[Route Processors]] * [[Line Cards]] * [[Alarm Cards, Power & Cooling]]
== Software ==
* [[IOS-12.0S]] * [[IOS-XR]]
